title: Climbing plants
brief_description: A study of climbing plants, including such “scramblers” as the bramble and the rose; the leaf-holding clematis, the canary creeper, the root climbing ivy, etc.
description: A study of climbing plants, including such “scramblers” as the bramble and the rose; the leaf-holding clematis, the canary creeper, the root climbing ivy, etc.
